content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I do not have an exact number to provide.
name: Evaluator

content: Understood. Would you be willing to negotiate further with Peter Schmidt or would you prefer to look for other options?
name: Haoyu Wang

content: I would be willing to negotiate further with Peter Schmidt, as I believe there is still room for agreement.
name: Evaluator

content: Good to hear that you're open to further negotiation. Would you consider offering a higher price or would you rather stick to your initial offer?
name: Haoyu Wang

content: I would consider offering a higher price, but it would depend on the perceived value of the apartment and the terms of the lease.
name: Evaluator

content: Understood. Would you be comfortable with a price range slightly above your initial offer of 700 Euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang
